param.name: VRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Voltage Range: +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: VRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Range: +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: MaxSheetPoints
param.toolTips: Maximum number of samples for Segment ARB waveform measurement (used to calculate Sample Rate). Not applicable for spot mean measurements.

param.name: DUTResCh1
param.toolTips: Resistance of DUT connected to PMU Channel 1.

param.name: DUTResCh2
param.toolTips: Resistance of DUT connected to PMU Channel 2.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for DC bias (V). Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: VRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Range: +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: VRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Range: +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: MeasSegStart
param.toolTips: Measurement Window Start %, for each segment with measurement enabled.

param.name: MeasSegStop
param.toolTips: Measurement Window Stop %, for each segment with measurement enabled.

param.name: MaxSheetPoints
param.toolTips: Maximum number of samples for Segment ARB waveform measurement (used to calculate Sample Rate). Not applicable for spot mean measurements.

param.name: DUTResCh1
param.toolTips: Resistance of DUT connected to PMU Channel 1.

param.name: DUTResCh2
param.toolTips: Resistance of DUT connected to PMU Channel 2.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for DC bias (V). Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: NumWaveforms
param.toolTips: Number of Seg-Arb Waveforms to output and measure.

param.name: MaxSheetPoints
param.toolTips: Maximum number of samples for Segment ARB waveform measurement (used to calculate Sample Rate). Not applicable for spot mean measurements.

param.name: DUTResCh1
param.toolTips: Resistance of DUT connected to PMU Channel 1.

param.name: DUTResCh2
param.toolTips: Resistance of DUT connected to PMU Channel 2.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: SMU_V
param.toolTips: SMU DC Bias. Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for DC bias (V). Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: VRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Range, +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: VRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Range, +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: Period
param.toolTips: Pulse Period time. 10 V range: 140 ns to 1 s. 40 V range: 280 ns to 1 s. Both Gate and Drain share the same period time.

param.name: PulseWidthGate
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for Gate (FWHM). 10 V range: 60 ns to 0.99999 s. 40 V range: 140 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: RiseTimeGate
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%) for the Gate. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeGate
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%) for the Gate. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayGate
param.toolTips: Delay time (time before pulse) for the Gate. 10 V & 40 V: 20 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: PulseWidthDrain
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for Drain (FWHM). 10 V range: 60 ns to 0.99999s. 40 V range: 140 ns to 0.99999s.

param.name: RiseTimeDrain
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%) for the Drain. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeDrain
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%) for the Drain. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayDrain
param.toolTips: Delay time (time before pulse) for the Drain. 10 V & 40 V: 20 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: AmplVGate
param.toolTips: Pulse Amplitude of Gate (height from base voltage).

param.name: BaseVGate
param.toolTips: Base V (DC offset) for Gate.

param.name: PMUMode
param.toolTips: Use "Simple" for basic PMU test (no I-ranging, LLEC, or thresholds). If you need these features, use "Ranging, LLEC".

param.name: LoadLineGate
param.toolTips: Check to enable Load Line Effect Compensation (LLEC) on the Gate terminal of the test device.

param.name: LoadLineDrain
param.toolTips: Check to enable Load Line Effect Compensation (LLEC) on the Drain terminal of the test device.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: SMU_V
param.toolTips: SMU DC Bias. Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for DC bias (V). Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: VRangeGate
param.toolTips: Gate Range, +/- 10V or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeGate
param.toolTips: Gate Measure (A) Range. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: VRangeDrain
param.toolTips: Drain Range, +/- 10V or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeDrain
param.toolTips: Drain Measure Range (A). Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: StartVDrain
param.toolTips: Starting voltage for Drain amplitude sweep.

param.name: StopVDrain
param.toolTips: Final voltage for Drain amplitude sweep.

param.name: StepVDrain
param.toolTips: Voltage step size for Drain amplitude sweep.

param.name: MeasStartGate
param.toolTips: Start of spot mean measure window, as a fraction of pulse top.

param.name: MeasStopGate
param.toolTips: End of spot mean measure window, as a fraction of pulse top.

param.name: PulseAverage
param.toolTips: Number of pulses to source and measure.

param.name: BaseVDrain
param.toolTips: Base (DC V offset) for Drain.

param.name: LtdAutoCurrGate
param.toolTips: Check to enable Limited Auto Range for the Gate.

param.name: LtdAutoCurrDrain
param.toolTips: Check to enable Limited Auto Range for the Drain.

param.name: PulseTop
param.toolTips: Width of the top of the pulse.

param.name: RiseTime
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%). 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTime
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%). 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: BaseTime
param.toolTips: Time after the pulse (at the base voltage).

param.name: DelayTime
param.toolTips: Time before the pulse (at the base voltage), 20 ns to 40 s.

param.name: Ch1_V_Ampl
param.toolTips: Gate (PMU Channel 1) Pulse Voltage Amplitude (height from base voltage).

param.name: Ch1_V_Base
param.toolTips: Gate (PMU Channel 1) base voltage (DC offset).

param.name: SaveFile
param.toolTips: Check to save waveform to a CSV text file.

param.name: Filename
param.toolTips: Filename for results, which will be saved in the path = C:\s4200\kiuser\export\

param.name: MaxSheetPoints
param.toolTips: Number of waveform samples to graph.

param.name: MaxFilePoints
param.toolTips: Number of waveform samples to store in the results file.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: SMU_V
param.toolTips: DC Bias. Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for DC (V) bias. Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: Ch1_VRange
param.toolTips: Gate (PMU Channel 1) range: +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: Ch1_IRange
param.toolTips: Gate Measure (A) Range (PMU Channel 1), fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: Ch2_VRange
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) range: +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: Ch2_IRange
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: Ch2_StartV
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) starting Pulse Voltage amplitude for sweep.

param.name: Ch2_StopV
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) Final Pulse Voltage amplitude for sweep.

param.name: Ch2_StepV
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) Pulse Voltage amplitude step size for sweep.

param.name: Ch2_V_Base
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) base voltage (DC offset).

param.name: AppendTimeToFilename
param.toolTips: Check to append the date and time to to the end of the filename. This is useful when performing many tests and all data should be saved.

param.name: Period
param.toolTips: Pulse period, shared by Gate and Drain, 120 ns to 1s.

param.name: PW_Gate
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for the Gate terminal, 60 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: RiseTimeGate
param.toolTips: Rise time for the Gate pulse, range 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeGate
param.toolTips: Fall time for the Gate pulse, range 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayGate
param.toolTips: Delay time before the Gate pulse, 0s to 0.999999s.

param.name: PW_Drain
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for the Drain terminal, 60 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: RiseTimeDrain
param.toolTips: Rise time for the Drain pulse, range 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeDrain
param.toolTips: Fall time for the Drain pulse, range 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayDrain
param.toolTips: Delay time before the Drain pulse, 0s to 0.99999s.

param.name: AmplVGate
param.toolTips: Pulse Voltage Amplitude of Gate (height from base voltage).

param.name: BaseVGate
param.toolTips: Base voltage (DC offset) for Gate.

param.name: MeasStartGate
param.toolTips: Measure window start point for pulse spot mean, taken on the top of the pulse, specified as a fraction of the Gate pulse top time. To measure entire pulse top, set Start = 0. Default = 0.55.

param.name: MeasStopGate
param.toolTips: Measure window stop point for pulse spot mean, taken on the top of the pulse, specified as a fraction of the Gate pulse top time. To measure entire pulse top, set Start = 1. Default = 0.7.

param.name: PMUMode
param.toolTips: Use "Simple" for basic PMU test (no I-ranging, LLEC, or thresholds). If you need these features, use "Ranging, LLEC".

param.name: MaxSheetRows
param.toolTips: Determines the maximum number of samples for the waveform, range: 100 to 32767.

param.name: LoadLineGate
param.toolTips: Check box to enable Load Line Effect Compensation (LLEC) for the Gate terminal.

param.name: LoadLineDrain
param.toolTips: Check box to enable Load Line Effect Compensation (LLEC) for the Drain terminal.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: SMU_V
param.toolTips: SMU DC Bias. Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for DC bias (V). Must not be connected to an RPM or a device terminal that responds to pulsing.

param.name: VRangeGate
param.toolTips: Gate Range, +/-10 or +/-40.

param.name: IRangeGate
param.toolTips: Gate (PMU Channel 1) Measure (A) Range. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: VRangeDrain
param.toolTips: Drain Range, +/-10 or +/-40.

param.name: IRangeDrain
param.toolTips: Drain (PMU Channel 2) Measure (A) Range. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: AmplVDrain
param.toolTips: Pulse Voltage Amplitude of Drain (height from base voltage).

param.name: BaseVDrain
param.toolTips: Base voltage (DC offset) for Drain.

param.name: PulseAverage
param.toolTips: Number of pulses to output and measure.

param.name: PrePulse
param.toolTips: Amount of waveform to sample before the pulse, specified as a percentage of the pulse width.

param.name: PostPulse
param.toolTips: Amount of waveform to sample after the pulse, specified as a percentage of the pulse width.

param.name: Period
param.toolTips: Pulse Period time. 10 V range: 140 ns to 1 s. 40 V range: 280 ns to 1 s.

param.name: PulseWidthCh1
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for PMU channel (FWHM). 10 V range: 60 ns to 0.99999 s. 40 V range: 140 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: RiseTimeCh1
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%) for the PMU channel. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeCh1
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%) for the PMU channel. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayCh1
param.toolTips: Delay time (time before pulse) for the PMU channel. 10 V & 40 V: 20 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: MeasStartPerc
param.toolTips: Measure window start point for pulse spot mean, taken on the top of the pulse, specified as a fraction of the Gate pulse top time.

param.name: MeasStopPerc
param.toolTips: Measure window stop point for pulse spot mean, taken on the top of the pulse, specified as a fraction of the Gate pulse top time.

param.name: DUTResCh1
param.toolTips: Resistance of Test Device. If unknown, use 1E6. Range: 1 to 1E6 ohms.

param.name: PMUMode
param.toolTips: Use "Simple" for basic PMU test (LLEC). If you need this feature, use "LLEC".

param.name: SampleRate
param.toolTips: PMU A/D Sample Rate:1000 Sa/s to 200E6 Sa/s.

param.name: PulseAverage
param.toolTips: Number of pulses to output and measure: 1 to 10,000.

param.name: LoadLineCh1
param.toolTips: Check to enable Load Line Effect Compensation.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in test.

param.name: Chan
param.toolTips: PMU Channel to use for the test.

param.name: VRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Range, +/-10 or +/-40V.

param.name: IRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Measure (A) Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: StartVCh1
param.toolTips: Starting voltage for voltage amplitude sweep.

param.name: StopVCh1
param.toolTips: Final voltage for amplitude sweep.

param.name: StepVCh1
param.toolTips: Voltage step size for amplitude sweep.

param.name: BaseVCh1
param.toolTips: Pulse Voltage Amplitude (height from base voltage).

param.name: period
param.toolTips: Pulse Period time. 10 V range: 140 ns to 1 s. 40 V range: 280 ns to 1 s.

param.name: width
param.toolTips: Pulse Width (FWHM). 10 V range: 60 ns to 0.99999 s. 40 V range: 140 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: rise
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%). 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: fall
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%). 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: delay
param.toolTips: Delay time (time before pulse). 10 V & 40 V: 20 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: voltsSourceRng
param.toolTips: PMU Source Range: +/- 10V or +/-40V.

param.name: currentMeasureRng
param.toolTips: Current Measure Range, fixed. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: startV
param.toolTips: Starting voltage for voltage amplitude sweep. For a single pulse, set startV = stopV and stepV = 0.

param.name: stopV
param.toolTips: Final voltage for amplitude sweep.

param.name: stepV
param.toolTips: Voltage step size for amplitude sweep.

param.name: baseV
param.toolTips: Pulse Voltage Amplitude (height from base voltage).

param.name: DUTRes
param.toolTips: Resistance of test device. If unknown, enable LLEC and choose PMUMode "Ranging, LLEC".

param.name: LLEComp
param.toolTips: Check box to enable Load Line Effect Compensation.

param.name: SampleRate
param.toolTips: PMU A/D Sample rate: 200E6 Sa/s down to 1000 Sa/s.

param.name: PMUMode
param.toolTips: Use "Simple" for basic PMU test (no LLEC). If you need this feature, use "LLEC". Must also have LLEC checkbox enabled.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use for the test.

param.name: chan
param.toolTips: PMU Channel to use for the test.

param.name: acqType
param.toolTips: When pulseAvgCnt = 1, determines if all pulses are averaged together to return a single pulse, or return each pulse individually.

param.name: preDataPct
param.toolTips: Amount of waveform to capture before the pulse.

param.name: postDataPct
param.toolTips: Amount of waveform to capture after the pulse.

param.name: pulseAvgCnt
param.toolTips: Number of pulses to output and measure.

param.name: Period
param.toolTips: Pulse Period time. 10 V range: 140 ns to 1 s. 40 V range: 280 ns to 1 s. Both Channel 1 and Channel 2 share the same period time.

param.name: PulseWidthCh1
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for Channel 1 (FWHM). 10 V range: 60 ns to 0.99999 s. 40 V range: 140 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: RiseTimeCh1
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%) for the Channel 1. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeCh1
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%) for the Channel 1. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayCh1
param.toolTips: Delay time (time before pulse) for Channel 1. 10 V & 40 V: 20 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: PulseWidthCh2
param.toolTips: Pulse Width for Channel 2 (FWHM). 10 V range: 60 ns to 0.99999 s. 40 V range: 140 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: RiseTimeCh2
param.toolTips: Rise time (0-100%) for the Channel 2. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: FallTimeCh2
param.toolTips: Fall time (0-100%) for the Channel 2. 10 V range: 20 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited). 40 V range: 100 ns to 33 ms (slew-rate limited).

param.name: DelayCh2
param.toolTips: Delay time (time before pulse) for Channel 2. 10 V & 40 V: 20 ns to 0.99999 s.

param.name: AmplVCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Voltage amplitude (voltage height from Vbase) or SMU Channel 1 Voltage.

param.name: BaseVCh1
param.toolTips: Base voltage (DC offset) for PMU Channel 1.

param.name: VRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Range, +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh1
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Measure (A) Range. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: VRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Range, +/-10 or +/- 40V.

param.name: IRangeCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 2 Measure (A) Range. Note: Available ranges differ based on Voltage Range and if an RPM is connected.

param.name: SMU_Irange
param.toolTips: SMU Channel 2 Current range.

param.name: ExecMode
param.toolTips: Determines whether to execute a pulse I-V test, a DC SMU I-V test, or both.

param.name: PMUMode
param.toolTips: Use "Simple" for basic PMU test (no I-ranging, LLEC, or thresholds). If you need these features, use "Ranging, LLEC".

param.name: Ch1SMU_ID
param.toolTips: SMU to use for Channel 1.

param.name: PMU_ID
param.toolTips: PMU to use in Test.

param.name: StartVCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Voltage starting amplitude (voltage height from Vbase) or SMU Channel 1 starting voltage for sweep.

param.name: StopVCh2
param.toolTips: PMU Channel 1 Voltage final amplitude (voltage height from Vbase) or SMU Channel 1 final voltage for sweep.

param.name: StepVCh2
param.toolTips: PMU or SMU Channel 1 Voltage step size for sweep.

param.name: PulseAverage
param.toolTips: Number of pulses to output and measure: 1 to 10,000.

param.name: LoadLineCh1
param.toolTips: Check to enable Load Line Effect Compensation on Channel 1.

param.name: LoadLineCh2
param.toolTips: Check to enable Load Line Effect Compensation on Channel 2.

param.name: BaseVCh2
param.toolTips: Base voltage (DC offset) for PMU Channel 2.

param.name: SMU_Icomp
param.toolTips: SMU Channel 2 current compliance.
